name: Zombie
description: A reanimated corpse, shambling and rotting, driven only by a desire to consume the living. Lacks intelligence and communicates only through actions.
memorable: High resilience due to Undead Fortitude, allowing it to remain in battle even after taking lethal damage.
goals: To consume the living and spread its undead nature.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead creatures or in service to dark sorcerers.
environment: Commonly found in graveyards, ancient tombs, or among dark sorcery.
strengths: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition, and can potentially survive lethal damage with Undead Fortitude.
weaknesses: Lacks mobility, low Intelligence means predictable behavior.
attacks: Can perform a Grab or Slam attack to restrain and damage opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows the Zombie to avoid falling unconscious when taking lethal damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Passive perception is low, making it somewhat oblivious to its surroundings.
additional_information: Resistant to exhaustion and poisoned condition.
Can turn slain foes into new zombies after 24 hours.
Grapples targets effectively with some attacks.
Often encountered in large numbers, increasing its threat level.
Mindless and driven by instinct, making it predictable.
test_queries: slow shambling undead that eats living
mindless zombie with high resilience to damage
creature that turns slain foes into new zombies
undead monster that grapples and bites
